title: WEDNESDAY - Return of the receivers 2020
itunes:title: WEDNESDAY - Return of the receivers 2020
description:
It's a big-matchup in Week 8 (0:07) as the undefeated Steelers take on the Ravens in an AFC North battle...hear what head coach Mike Tomlin had to say about the rivalry (0:44). Antonio Brown officially signing with the Buccaneers (1:42), and they may have to cash in that "insurance policy" in Week 9 as Chris Godwin deals with an injury. Meantime, the Ravens adding veteran wide receiver Dez Bryant (1:18) to their practice squad. We have the latest up date on Christian McCaffrey's return( 2:17). Cowboys owner Jerry Jones (3:44) gets fired up when asked about the team's leadership, and speaking of being fired up, Good Morning Football's Peter Schrager (4:54) teases a big surprise on the show and previews what is sure to get a little heated between him and Nate Burleson

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
